title: Who is responsible for maintaining the street lights on the west causeway into Brunswick County from the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge. Almost all of them at the convergence of 17, 74, 76, 421 are non-functional. Very dark and dangerous area particularly on rainy nights.These lights have been out for weeks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4003
